name: Signature Foods Belgium
description: Signature Foods Belgium is a food products supplier that is based in Turnhout, Belgium. They have been in business since 1962 and are the market leader in their category. They produce a variety of products, including smeersalades (salad spreads), Vlammetjes (spicy snacks), KaasTengels (cheese loempia), and VlamTosti's (croque monsieurs). Their products are mainly distributed in Belgium, France, and the Netherlands.
